kpi.name: LTE_323a
kpi.formula:
decode( (lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs0 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs1 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs2 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs3 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs4 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs5 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs6 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs7 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs8 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs9 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs10 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs11 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs12 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs13 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs14 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs15 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs16 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs17 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs18 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs19 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs20 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs21 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs22 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs23 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs24 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs25 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs26 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs27 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs28),0,null,
(100*(lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs1)) / (lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs0 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs1 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs2 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs3 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs4 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs5 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs6 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs7 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs8 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs9 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs10 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs11 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs12 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs13 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs14 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs15 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs16 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs17 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs18 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs19 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs20 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs21 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs22 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs23 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs24 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs25 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs26 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs27 + lcellt.tb_vol_pdsch_mcs28))

kpi_info.title: Perc Traffic DL MCS1
kpi_info.use: Percentage traffic transferred in DL PDSCH using code MCS1
kpi_info.formula:
100* sum (TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS1 )
-----------------------------------------------------------------
sum (TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS0 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS1 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS2 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS3 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS4 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS5 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS6 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS7 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS8 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS9 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS10 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS11 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS12 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS13 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS14 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS15 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS16 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS17 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS18 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS19 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS20 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS21 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS22 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS23 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS24 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS25 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS26 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS27 + TB_VOL_PDSCH_MCS28 )

null
